summary: A mod that i started today and will be working on untill i am finished, It is about the Thibault family from fuedal france brought to skyrim.
descriptionHtml: The thibault family is going to war with the stormcloaks and the Imperials, This Mod is going to allow you to recruit any soldiers from Lord Thibault\'s army, I may have custom armor for the game if not it will take 10x longer for my goals and standards for me to put the beta version of the game out. U will be able to recruit as many followers as u want (Not hard to do) Recruit any soldier of the thibault army but not from Lord Thibault\'s Elite Leigon, New quest line, Many many many new npc\'s, New locations on the map, New avalible weapons, armor, spells and a suprise ;). New followers, Expansion to the skyrim map and questline taking your fight once Lord Thibault Rules Tamriel into the heart of the empire (part of end product)
author: Ereaise
